eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Adams, NE; AT 09:35 PM ON OCT 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:05 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: There is a dangerous subject in the area of Northern Adams County. Stay Indoors.  Report any suspicious activity Stay indoors, lock all doors and windows.  report any suspicious activity to 911.
